price: Hakika Mimi leo nimewalipa kwa vile walivyo subiri. Bila ya shaka hao ndio wenye kufuzu.
arabic: إِنِّي جَزَيۡتُهُمُ ٱلۡيَوۡمَ بِمَا صَبَرُوٓاْ أَنَّهُمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡفَآئِزُونَ
footnotes: Hakika Mimi hii leo nimewalipa wao kwa mafanikio, kwa kuwa waliyavumilia maskhara yenu na maudhi yenu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innī jazaytuhumu al-yawma bimā ṣabarū annahum humu al-fāizūna
